Text: The common pochard ("Aythya ferina") is a medium-sized diving duck.

1:
--------------------
Text: Common pochard:  The scientific name is derived from Greek " aithuia" an unidentified seabird mentioned by authors including Hesychius and Aristotle, and Latin "ferina", "wild game", from "ferus", "wild".
